hadiths.text: It was narrated from Samurah that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ), said:"If two (separate) authorized persons make a sale (of the same thing), then the first transaction is the one that is valid

chapter.ara-name: باب إِذَا بَاعَ الْمُجِيزَانِ فَهُوَ لِلأَوَّلِ
chapter.eng-name: If Two Authorized Persons Make A Sale, Then The First Transaction Is The One That Is Val
